bibl.title: Hellenica. Selected Papers on Greek Literature and Thought. Volume II. Lyric and Drama.
bibl.note: Reproduction de 30 contributions (1965-2008) et 1 inédit. - Pp. 391-393: Παροψημάτια [four miscellaneous pieces of verse composition] (I. Aus der Geschichte der Textüberlieferung; - II. Verses sent to Bruno Snell, June 1986; - III. A Hexameter Containing No Consonants; - IV. Cassandra Smells Dinner); - 394-397: Supplementary list of publications relating to lyric and drama.
bibl.seg: Martin L. West, Hellenica. Selected Papers on Greek Literature and Thought. Volume II. Lyric and Drama.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 2013, 8°, xii-408 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-960502-6. £99.

Reproduction de 30 contributions (1965-2008) et 1 inédit. - Pp. 391-393: Παροψημάτια [four miscellaneous pieces of verse composition] (I. Aus der Geschichte der Textüberlieferung; - II. Verses sent to Bruno Snell, June 1986; - III. A Hexameter Containing No Consonants; - IV. Cassandra Smells Dinner); - 394-397: Supplementary list of publications relating to lyric and drama.
C.R. par T.R.P. Coward, CR N.S., 64 (2014) pp. 347-349.
